title: Duck three ways with roasted pears, shallots, wilted chard and a red wine reduction
description: Preparing confit duck takes time, but the result is meltingly tender duck. Served here with chard, sour sweet pear and shallots and a rich wine and beef sauce.
ingredients: 4 duck legs, separated into drumstick and thighs
15g/½oz table salt per kilo of duck legs
salt and freshly ground black pepper
